sentences.english: I would not hold this up as comparable to surgical mitral valve repair.
sentences.chinese: 我不會認爲它的效果與二尖瓣外科修補相當。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical manifestation of mitral valve prolapse syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解二尖瓣脫垂綜合徵的臨牀表現。

sentences.english: The backward flow of blood through the valve is called mitral valve regurgitation.
sentences.chinese: 這種血液的反向流過瓣膜稱爲“二尖瓣反流”。

sentences.english: The experience in mistral valve replacement (MVR) for 334 patients is reported.
sentences.chinese: 本文報告334例二尖瓣置換術的臨牀經驗。

sentences.english: Geometric distributions of regurgitant jets appearing are helpful for determining the severity of mitral and aortic re-gurgitation.
sentences.chinese: 返流束的空間分佈與二尖瓣的基礎病變有一定關係。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical value of phase analysis by mitral annular movement in assessment of left ventricular diastolic function.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討二尖瓣環時相評估左室舒張功能的臨牀意義。

sentences.english: Objective To study the relationship between the degree of mitral stenosis (MS) and atrial filling fraction (AFF).
sentences.chinese: 目的研究二尖瓣狹窄程度與左房充盈分數的關係。

sentences.english: Moderate mitral regurgitation was more common in eccentric left ventricular hypertrophy group.
sentences.chinese: 離心性肥厚組中度二尖瓣反流者較多。

sentences.english: Results The group had no case dead, 2 cases need re-mitral valve replacement.
sentences.chinese: 結果全組無手術死亡病例，2例行二尖瓣置換術。

sentences.english: What is heart mitral valve velar prolapse?
sentences.chinese: 什麼是心臟二尖瓣膜脫垂？

sentences.english: Objective To explore new method of percutaneous balloon serious mitral stenosis commissurotomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索重度二尖瓣狹窄球囊分離術治療的新方法。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the mechanism of functional mitral regurgitation (FMR).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討功能性二尖瓣返流的機制。

sentences.english: Artificial mechanical aortic and mitral valves were intermittently sutured.
sentences.chinese: 間斷縫合人工機械二尖瓣膜和主動脈瓣膜。

sentences.english: From the left atrium the blood passes through the bicuspid valve into the right ventricle .
sentences.chinese: 來自左心房的血液通過二尖瓣進入右心室。

sentences.english: Two men with failed mitral valves died after the initial surgery.
sentences.chinese: 兩名伴損毀二尖瓣的男性術後死亡。

definition: basilar artery (central artery of the brain)
mediastinum (organs and tissues in the thorax between the lungs)
atrial fibrillation (abbr. for 心房顫動|心房颤动[xin1 fang2 chan4 dong4])
